p: Satellite images are aggregated at the scale of the Netherlands' residential zones (wijken) – spatial boundaries defined by the statistical bureau of the Netherlands [4], and the average summer surface temperature of each zone is retrieved. To aggregate the stellite imagery rasters (1 km × 1 km) at the sale of residential zones, first, the rasters resampled at a finer scale (50 m × 50 m). Subsequently, the fine-scale raster file is aggregated at the scale of residential zones.
